description: Elevate your morning scramble with an extra flavour hit from mushrooms and spinach.
keywords: Scrambled eggs,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg,Spinach,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Mushroom & Spinach Scrambled Eggs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan on a medium high heat, add a knob of butter and fry the mushrooms, spinach and thyme for 3 minutes until softened. Add lemon juice and black pepper to taste and set aside.

Toast the sourdough to your liking and place a large non-stick pan on a medium low heat with the remaining butter. Once the butter has melts, tip in the beaten eggs and cook gently for 2 minutes, stirring often until the eggs begin set.
Stir in a tablespoon of grated parmesan and cracked black pepper and remove from the heat.
Top each slice of sourdough with scrambled eggs, mushrooms and spinach and finish with grated parmesan.
